page.title: 13TICKHILL ANGLO-FRENCH ASSOC.
page.content: In May 1984 the Tickhill Anglo-French Association was formed.Tickhill's{twin {town}is Ecquevilly which lies 15 miles north-west of Paris.The association was originally for adults but recently I have helped to form a junior section.In October 1983 a party of 22 visited Ecquevilly and in March 1984 members of the French section visited Tickhill.During their stay in Tickhill the children came to a party at my house.The next night there was a {French Evening}at the Parish Rooms.At Tickhill Gala there will be a decorated float entered by the association.To raise funds,there have been many functions including a disco and a wine tasting evening.My family and others have been invited to visit Ecquevilly in August 1985 .Hopefully these visits will continue for many years to come.
